name: Bullseye Throw
text:
Cost: 2 AP.
Make a thrown weapon attack with a dagger, sword, axe, or spear against an enemy character. If the attack succeeds, instead of dealing damage, it temporarily reduces the enemy's speed by the same amount. If the enemy's speed is reduced to 0 this way, it's immobilized until it dislodges your weapon or you recover it.

Dislodging the weapon requires an Active Strength check.
